```{r 30057602, include=FALSE}

PMID_30057602 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('30057602', database = 'PubMed')

citation_30057602 <- paste0(PMID_30057602$journal,' ', PMID_30057602$year, ' ', PMID_30057602$month,';', PMID_30057602$volume,'(', PMID_30057602$number,'):', PMID_30057602$pages)

PubMed_30057602 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_30057602$eprint)

doi_30057602 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_30057602$doi)

dimensionBadge_30057602 <- paste0(dimensionString1, PMID_30057602$doi,dimensionString2)

altmetricBadge_30057602 <- paste0(altmetricString1, PMID_30057602$doi, altmetricString2 )

```
